cs.SE, cs.PL, cs.LO, cs.CR, cs.SY. 

The paper is focused on automatic software repair, which falls under the software engineering (cs.SE) category. The specific problem being addressed is the repair of infinite loops, which involves manipulating and analyzing program loops, suggesting that programming languages (cs.PL) and logic (cs.LO) may also be relevant sub-categories. The paper also mentions the use of Satisfiability Modulo Theory (SMT) for code synthesis, which is a technique used in automated reasoning and verification (cs.CR) and system design (cs.SY).
